subject: p16662264
History: Evaluation of the patient with history of ARDS, with decreasing saturations.
Findings: Portable AP radiograph of the chest was compared to and chest CT from. As compared to, there is interval development of pleural effusion as well as substantial progression of right basal consolidations. The findings have been already demonstrated on, chest CT. Overall, as compared to CT there is no substantial change demonstrated on the current chest radiograph.
